name: mushroomquest!
description:
this is my 1st game I am selling it is an rpg and it is still in progress but I am working on it. I used professional sprites I don't know who made them but credit goes to them on some of the objects

levels: there are so far 5 levels the 1st is an armory the 2nd is the outside of the castle the 3rd is a free roam corrupted mushroom land and it has a dungeon in it 4th is a mushroom village 5th is the hive with a dungeon in it

instructions: use w a s d and space to shoot to shoot touch the chest and you pick up a weapon
